title: What position was of Sudhra during the Dravida period? - Quora

response.answer_text: Shudra is the term coined by Manu to classify one of the four Varnas. It is applicable to south of Himalayas and north of vindhyas. Other parts of India has different caste systems like Ayyars, Ayyangars, Badugas, Chettiras, Thevars, Kallars, Maravars, Nadars, Naidus, Pillais, Rajus, Vellalars, etc etc. Can you specify which caste you belong to? How you are affected? So that it can be addressed.
Couldn’t understand your question. Dravida period means?. Sudhras are defined as 4th varna of people according to Manusmrithi. It doesn’t matter with any Dravida period or Aryan period.
